name: SDG Tracker | Bangladesh Development Mirror
description: The SDG Tracker serves as a platform to monitor and report on the prioritized targets of the SDGs for Bangladesh, including Goals 1 (No Poverty), 2 (Zero Hunger), 3 (Good health and well-being), 4 (Quality Education), 5 (Gender Equality) and others.
owner_name: Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics (SDG Cell) / Government of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh
